snippet: The 65 institutions in the N.C.A.A.’s so-called Big 5 conferences have officially received latitude to govern themselves, which could lead to their athletes getting more money and using agents.
abstract: Sixty-five institutions in NCAA’s so-called Big 5 football conferences have officially received latitude to govern themselves, which could lead to their athletes getting more money and using agents; other college football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The 65 institutions in the N.C.A.A.’s so-called Big 5 conferences have officially received latitude to govern themselves, which could lead to their athletes getting more money and using agents.
